roleset.name: cause frustration, upset composure
roleset.note: DISCONCERT-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from disconcert.01-v)

example.name: passive, infinitival complement
example.text: I-1 was disconcerted *-1 to find that there's no C compiler on the Ubuntu system.
example.arg: to find that there's no C compiler on the Ubuntu system
